name: Bisexual
description: Scenes with male and female scene partners, with action between male performers.

name: Gay
description: Scenes with only male scene partners.

name: Lesbian
description: Scenes with only female scene partners.

name: Straight
description: Scenes with male and female scene partners, without action between male performers.

name: Transgender
description: Scenes that feature trans performers, either alone or with scene partners.

name: Transgender (Female)
description: Scenes that feature trans women performers, either alone or with scene partners, who identify as female.

name: Transgender (Male)
description: Scenes that feature trans male performers, either alone or with scene partners, who identify as male.

name: Transgender (Non-Binary)
description: Scenes that feature non-binary performers, either alone or with scene partners.
